data.name: 奇迹世界 miracle world
data.detailed_description:
[/b]This is a creative game[/b]

in the game players only need to play their imagination in the game to create their own world miracle world is a convenient and fast game, every time you enter the game will be a new experience, [/i]free to create the world you want in the game
the function of the game is to build at will

The functions of the game include

It can be created in an open world

Come to miracle world use your powerful imagination to create your own world
in the game,you can use your imagination to create freely in this world

Use your powerful imagination to join the building army

data.short_description: miracle world is a creative game，which is equivalent to 2D minecraft press the left mouse button delete press the right mouse button come and join the game，use your imagination and create your own world with millions of players
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
